Class RGBColor

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.model.impl.RGBColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Color, Serializable
public class RGBColor extends Object implements Color, Serializable
Basic implementation of the Color interface storing the red, green and blue components as integer attributes.
See Also:
